onAddButton() - Method in class controller.Schedule
Opens the AppointmentForm view when the user presses the addAppointmentButton.
onAppointmentsButton() - Method in class controller.Reports
Sets the TextArea to Appointments sorted by type and month, and sets the report member variable to the appropriate text for the title of a related txt file.

Set the selectedAppointment to the correct item in the TableView.
onCancelButton(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AppointmentForm
Closes the AppointmentForm without saving anything to the database.

Closes the CustomerForm without saving anything to the database.

Set the selectedCustomer to the correct item in the TableView.
onDeleteButton() - Method in class controller.Schedule
Deletes the selected appointment when the user presses the deleteAppointmentButton.
onDismissRectangleButton() - Method in class controller.Schedule
Hides the Appointment warning banner after the user presses the Acknowledge button.
onEndSpinnerClick() - Method in class controller.AppointmentForm
Updates the endTimeLabel with the selected hour.
onExportButton() - Method in class controller.Reports
Writes the current report to a txt file.
onLocationReportButton() - Method in class controller.Reports
Sets the TextArea to Customer data sorted by their location, and sets the report member variable to the appropriate text for the title of a related txt file.

Used to establish a connection and log the user into the database.
onLogOutButton(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.Schedule
Opens the Login screen and closes the Schedule.

Call toggle() when the month radio is selected.

Used to show the Reports stage when the Report button is pressed.

Writes the customer object to the database.

Updates the startTimeLabel with the selected hour.
